AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pack alpha
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a disproven study into the dominance heirarchy in wolf packs. When the study went underground, it took [PAWN_nameDef]'s humanity and made [PAWN_objective] an alpha.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pack beta
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a disproven study into the dominance heirarchy in wolf packs. When the study went underground, it took [PAWN_nameDef]'s humanity and made [PAWN_objective] a lesser member, a beta.
